title: 2020 Week 4 Preview
itunes:title: 2020 Week 4 Preview
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal and Marc Sessler bring you an in depth preview of every upcoming game of Week 4 starting with Pats-Chiefs with Tony Romo on the call (5:30), Cowboys-Browns (12:45) and Bills- Raiders (19:00). Gregg makes a surprising lock to prove the haters wrong and Dan says that the Chargers gonna' charger (39:21). Sessler makes a weird comparison that you just can't afford to mis at 1:11:23.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
